lines.setup: Dianna hears the hiss of her cabin doors opening and then a familiar voice, 'They'll be many handsome men at the party tonight dear. Perhaps you'll snag one.' 'Mother!' Dianna exclaims 'What are you doing here?'
lines.replicator_command: I need a Chocolate Passion Punch now.
lines.move_on_to_next_episode: Congratulations! You may now move on to the next episode.
lines.responding_to_nothing_on_replicator_plat: Where is it? There's nothing here!
lines.responding_to_replicator_creation_failur: I'm terribly disappointed by this Chocolate Punch. It's not making me feel better at all!
